Class ImageObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.object.GUIObject
      • gui.object.ImageObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GUIButton

    public class ImageObject
extends GUIObject
    A GUI class designed to draw an image to the screen. For deriving purposes.

    Jani
